Title: Welcome Wagons
Description:
Did you see the size of those war wagons? They're packing so many explosives, I cannae tell if the Horde is here to take over this continent or just blow it out of the sea!

We need to neutralize those wagons before they leave Garrosh'ar Point.

Here, take me pocket flares. Fire 'em into a wagon and watch the fireworks!
ObjectivesText: Use Sully's Flaregun to destroy 5 Horde War Wagons.
RewardText: With those wagons out of commission, we can turn our attention to the commander.
